name: P.Pica
description:
A game created for the Game Studio 2023 game jam.

You play as a magpie and as magpies do, you collect shiny objects and bring them back to your nest. But is there enough time for that...?

Music and sounds by:

shiru8bit

forest - syncopika

Pleasant Creek - Matthew Pablo

step step step - syncopika

Happy Pixie Town - HitCtrl

One - pheonton

Happy Janian - Marcelo Fernandez

happy tune - syncopika
